ThingDef.label: Bioferrous honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by Bioferrous bees. They infuse background amounts of minerals in the ground with strange fibrous mechanites, producing small amounts of bioferrite. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get black honey, beeswax and bioferrite.

ThingDef.label: Shard honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by Shard bees. They just want to see the world burn. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get black honey, black beeswax and shards.
